headline: Rep. Jordan to Newsmax: We’ll Have to Wait for DOJ Regarding Hunter’s Laptop
author: NationalWatch
sentences:
Rep. Jordan to Newsmax: We'll Have to Wait for DOJ Regarding Hunter's Laptop (Newsmax/''Eric Bolling: The Balance'')
By Nick Koutsobinas | Tuesday, 29 March 2022 07:24 PM
Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, told Newsmax on Tuesday that what the public can divine from Hunter Biden's laptop will depend on Attorney General Merrick Garland, who was nominated by President Joe Biden.

Even though Big Tech, big media and the Democrats all colluded to give us this information a year and a half ago, and just days before the election, it was all true.
Earlier this month, the Times confirmed that ''a cache of files … appears to have come from a laptop abandoned by Mr. [Hunter] Biden in a Delaware repair shop.''
Speaking in regards to an investigation, Jordan said: ''I don't know what Merrick Garland's Justice Department is going to do?
This is a story … that we learned about last fall, so we'll have to see'' if it will be investigated.
It seems to me right now they're spending way too much time trying to spy on moms and dads.
